s.text: A sense of what should be engaging the country more than all of this comes with a reading of today's WP editorial about the current situation in Serbia . Various diplomats are quoted claiming that Serbian troops under the command of Slobodan Milosevic have shot many ethnic Albanians in Kosovo, and through a scorched-earth policy are fixing to let many more--hundreds of thousands--starve to death.

The NYT reports that a number of economists say that some of the Asian countries hardest hit by the region's economic crisis are now in a depression, meaning of a much longer duration and with much more unemployment than a recession.
